title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 12
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Sept. 12
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Limoneira (LMNR). Limoneira Co.'s shares are headed for their biggest drop in \u0010eight months after fiscal third-quarter results proved to be disappointing. Earnings at the producer of lemons and avocados trailed analysts' average estimate in a Bloomberg survey even though revenue topped projections. Avocado sales volume fell after prices surged earlier this year.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
